_sText:
Once i had the idea of an interactive map
A map where you can dynamically create your props
to barricade yourself from zombies.

Or something to play with, like a fully working magnetic crane!

This map is an industrial like map,
there is storage rooms, there is a lab with machinery
and stuff. There's restrooms down the cellar (where the lockers are)
there even is a cellar where you can barricade yourself off.
Just look for brown switches. They look harmless but they spawn
stuff like: sofa, vending machine, shelf, cabinets etc.
there is also classic barricade spots and barricade spots noobs cant break
also there are traps in the map.
most of them are in the vents to prevent lame vent camping.
